QuestData.Title: Honorable Discharge
QuestData.Description:
Some of the spirits on the battlefield are too weary to go on. These were brave Kul Tirans. They have more than earned their rest but their sense of duty holds them here.
Order the most weary spirits off the field of battle. Hopefully they will be convinced to rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Dismiss $oa Weary Spirits from the battlefield.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good their spirits returned to their final rest once more. May they never be disturbed again.
